onlineAddresses.caption: Creator Handbook: How Daniel Mac became TikTok’s supercar guru

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Daniel is one of the largest automotive and entrepreneurial content creators on TikTok, gathering an audience of over 12M followers in just one year of being on the platform.
  • He is well known for his "What do you do for a living?" videos that have taken the short-form content world by storm.
  • Daniel has shot content at events such as the launch of Virgin Galactic’s SpaceShipTwo and the premiere of Universal’s Fast 9, shooting content with Helen Mirren and Sung Kang.
  • Daniel has also worked with several brands including Chevy, Bugatti, Gillette, Activision, Amazon, Epic Games, Xbox, UPS, and Formula 1.

speakerBiography.text:
Daniel is one of the largest automotive and entrepreneurial content creators on TikTok, gathering an audience of over 12M followers in just one year of being on the platform, with a total of over 16M followers across all platforms, including Instagram, YouTube, and Facebook. He is most known for his "What do you do for a living?" videos that have taken the short-form content world by storm.

Daniel’s format has also lent itself to global PR events, such as the launch of Virgin Galactic’s SpaceShipTwo, during which Daniel both attended and shot content with CEO Richard Branson, and the premiere of Universal’s Fast 9, shooting content with Helen Mirren and Sung Kang.

Daniel has also worked with several brands including Chevy, Bugatti, Gillette, Activision, Amazon, Epic Games, Xbox, UPS, and Formula 1, with Daniel attending and shooting content at the first-ever Formula 1 Grand Prix in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
